name: country_region_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geodb_cities.
Tool description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
API description: Retrieve the details of a specific country region, including the number of cities.

regioncode.description: An ISO-3166 or FIPS region code identifying the region.

countryid.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData ID identifying the country.

asciimode.description: If set to True, display results using ASCII characters. Defaults to None.

languagecode.description: The code of the language in which to display results. Defaults to None.
